code:
stateDiagram-v2
    [*] --> Draft
    Draft --> Review : submit_for_review
    Review --> Draft : request_changes
    Review --> Approved : approve
    Approved --> Funding : open_sale
    Funding --> Active : finalize_allocation
    Funding --> Cancelled : cancel_sale
    Active --> Paused : pause_project
    Paused --> Active : resume
    Active --> Closed : close_project
    Paused --> Closed : close_from_pause
    Closed --> [*]
